casebody.data:
George C. Johns, Respondent v. The Press Publishing Company, Appellant, Decided March 4, 1890. Appeal from an order vacating an order for the examination of the plaintiff before answer, DeLancy Nicoll, for appellant. Artemas B. Smith, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and Freedman, J.

The Court (Per Curiam)

affirmed the order on the authority of Roberts v. The Press Publishing Company, 57 N. Y. Superior Court R. 526.
